name: Viper Outer Great Barrier Reef Tour
description: Experience the ultimate Whitsunday adventure aboard Viper, the fastest vessel in the Whitsundays, designed for speed and comfort. This award-winning tour offers an unforgettable day exploring iconic destinations, including the Outer Great Barrier Reef and Whitehaven Beach. Perfect for thrill-seekers and nature enthusiasts, this tour combines high-speed travel with the opportunity to snorkel vibrant coral gardens and relax on pristine silica sands. With a small group size of up to 36 guests, enjoy personalized attention and an intimate adventure.
includes:
Pick up from accommodation
Guided walk to Hill Inlet lookout
Beach time at Whitehaven Beach with access to Viper toys
Buffet lunch on board
Snorkeling equipment (mask, snorkel, fins & lycra suit)
Guided snorkel safari led by a marine biologist
highlights:
Snorkel the Outer Great Barrier Reef
Explore Hill Inlet's swirling sands
Relax on Whitehaven Beach
Experience high-speed travel aboard a custom-built vessel
Enjoy a small group size of up to 36 guests
Guided snorkel safari with a marine biologist
Vibrant coral gardens teeming with marine life
Superior stability and comfort on an ocean-going vessel
ideal_for: Thrill-seekers, nature enthusiasts, and those seeking a comprehensive Whitsunday adventure
important_information: ['You must be at least 130cm tall to ride.', 'You must be physically fit and mobile.', 'You must not have any pre-existing back, neck or hip injuries.', 'You must be able to swim.']
what_to_bring: ['A Great Attitude: Bring your sense of adventure and be ready for an unforgettable day on the water!', 'Swimwear: You’ll want to be ready for snorkeling and swimming in the beautiful Whitsundays.', 'Footwear for a bush walk, if you are steady on foot, sandals or flip flops are sufficient for these walks.', 'Towel: Dry off after your swim or enjoy some sunbathing.', 'Sunscreen: Reef-safe sunscreen is highly recommended to protect your skin and the marine environment.', 'Sunglasses & Hat: The tropical sun can be strong, so protect your eyes and face.', 'Protective Clothing: A lightweight, long-sleeved shirt or rash guard is ideal for sun protection.', 'Camera/GoPro: Capture those once-in-a-lifetime moments above and below the water.', 'Water Bottle: Stay hydrated throughout the adventure.', 'Comfortable Footwear: Suitable for getting on and off the boat and exploring the beach.']

name: Lady Enid Adults Only Sailing Day Trip
description: Experience the Whitsundays with elegance aboard the Lady Enid, a rare traditional timber yacht. This adults-only sailing tour offers a refined adventure with a touch of luxury, perfect for those seeking a relaxed and intimate journey. With a small group size of up to 24 guests, enjoy personalized attention as you sail to the stunning Whitehaven Beach and snorkel the vibrant fringing reefs. Indulge in gourmet meals and a glass of sparkling wine, making this a truly unique and memorable day in the Whitsundays.
includes:
Sailing aboard the Lady Enid
Morning tea with fresh scones, jam, clotted cream, and strawberries
Buffet lunch with prawns, salmon, chicken breast, sliced ham, and quinoa salad
Glass of Australian sparkling wine
Antipasto and cheese platter
Snorkeling equipment
Guided walk to Hill Inlet lookout
Tea, coffee, or hot chocolate
Experienced crew
highlights:
Adults-only sailing tour
Intimate group size of 24 guests
Sail aboard a traditional timber yacht
Explore Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet
Snorkel vibrant coral gardens
Gourmet meals and sparkling wine
Personalized attention from four crew members
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- 8:00 AM – Departure from Coral Sea Marina
- Sail to Tongue Bay and explore Whitsunday Island
- Visit Hill Inlet and its iconic swirling sands
- Spend time on Whitehaven Beach
- Enjoy a buffet lunch onboard
- Snorkel at a pristine spot
- Sail back to port with sparkling wine and antipasto platter
menu:
**Menu:**
- Fresh scones with strawberry jam, clotted cream, and fresh strawberries
- Prawns, salmon, chicken breast & sliced ham
- Sourdough bread and condiments
- Quinoa and chickpea in a lemon sauce
- Glass of Australian sparkling
- Antipasto and cheese platter
ideal_for: Adults seeking a luxurious and intimate sailing adventure in the Whitsundays
important_information: ['Must be 18+', 'You must be physically fit and mobile.', 'You must be able to swim if you would like to snorkel.', 'This tour is not ideal for non-swimmers or if you feel apprehensive about entering the ocean.', 'Iconic Whitsunday Adventures always reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to accept, deny, or terminate participation by any person in any snorkelling activity at any time.', 'This may be due to various medical conditions; your risk may increase if you have any of the following conditions: Heart conditions or lung issues (including asthma), Medical conditions that may cause loss of consciousness (such as certain types of epilepsy or diabetes), Asthma or Epilepsy that can be triggered by cold water or saltwater mist.']
what_to_bring: ['A Great Attitude: Bring your sense of adventure and be ready for an unforgettable day on the water!', 'Swimwear: You’ll want to be ready for snorkeling and swimming in the beautiful Whitsundays.', 'Footwear for a bush walk, if you are steady on foot, sandals or flip flops are sufficient for these walks.', 'Towel: Dry off after your swim or enjoy some sunbathing.', 'Sunscreen: Reef-safe sunscreen is highly recommended to protect your skin and the marine environment.', 'Sunglasses & Hat: The tropical sun can be strong, so protect your eyes and face.', 'Protective Clothing: A lightweight, long-sleeved shirt or rash guard is ideal for sun protection.', 'Camera/GoPro: Capture those once-in-a-lifetime moments above and below the water.', 'Water Bottle: Stay hydrated throughout the adventure.', 'Comfortable Footwear: Suitable for getting on and off the boat and exploring the beach.']
